name: Dark Astral Nebula
description:
In this game you will control a small Nebuloid who has been called by god to save the universe. Darkness has overtaken the nebula and you must retrieve them. To do this you must use your magical gift: you can teleport up and down. You must go through all the planets of the nebula and collect the spheres of power that appear.

In addition, you will be able to save the little spirits from the elements that have been captured by evil creatures. These will accompany you and help with their special abilities on your way.

Discover the story of the game and enjoy the relaxing environments but challenging levels of the game.
